Summary: Saw something that hovered in the air
divs: Sighting DetailsI was waiting for a ride to go to church at about 8:30 AM or so on the morning on July 6th, 2008. I was waiting outside my apartment complex for my ride when I looked up towards the sky to the north of my location. I saw something hovering there for almost the whol;e time I was out there. I am not sure how long I was out there but between the time I went out & saw it & the time my ride got there it just sat there. It looked almost like a hot air balloon but it just hovered there. At one point, on the way to church after my ride got me, I still saw it in the sky but it had moved. It didn't act like a hot air ballon. It was like a dark blue object against the clear blue sky with the sunshit bright in the sky to my right. It didn't act like a hot air ballon. I have seen those on tv. I would be like getting in the car & talkingto my ride & then glancing up to see it every so often. It was weird.
trends: There have been 126 other sightings in Indianapolis
There were 2 other sightings in Indianapolis on or around July 6th 2008
